ROOT.QUERY:
WITH UBD AS ( SELECT ul_donord, LISTAGG(''['' || UE_USSCC || '','' || UE_ADRUMS || '']'' , '' / '') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY UE_USSCC) SSCC_ADDRESS , ul_cproin, ul_ilogis, ul_arprom, UT_VALIND, SUM(ul_nqtuvc) INV_SKU, SUM(ul_nqteup) INV_PU FROM TB_EUMS@HEINENS_STK_PROD, TB_LCUMS@HEINENS_STK_PROD, TB_TRAUMS@HEINENS_STK_PROD WHERE UT_VALIND IS NOT NULL AND UL_USSCC = UE_USSCC AND UE_INDFIC = ''1'' AND UL_USSCC = UT_USSCC AND UL_CSSCC = UT_CSSCC -- AND ul_cproin=''148636'' AND UL_NUMLIG = UT_NUMLIG GROUP BY ul_donord, UT_VALIND, ul_cproin, ul_ilogis, ul_arprom), UBD_LIST AS ( SELECT ul_donord WHS_CODE, dept_code, dept_desc, sub_dept_code, sub_dept_desc, cat_code, cat_desc, scat_code, scat_desc, ul_cproin ITEM_CODE, ul_ilogis LV, ar_libpro ITEM_DESC, ar_fourn VENDOR_CODE, ar_nrsfou VENDOR_DESC, UT_VALIND UBD, DECODE(INV_SKU,0,0,to_date(UT_VALIND, ''RRRRMMDD'') - TRUNC(SYSDATE)) DAYS_LEFT, AR_DLCJTC CONSUMER_DAYS, NVL((SELECT FLOOR(SUM(smssaiu)/8) FROM stomvsemaine@heinens_custom_prod, artuv@heinens_custom_prod WHERE Arvcinv=smscinl AND arvcexr=ar_cproin AND smssite=ul_donord AND to_number(to_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE), ''RRRRWW'')) - 8 >= smssemaine),0) AVG_WK_SHIP,
(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM avetar@heinens_custom_prod WHERE avestat =2 AND avedfin >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM aveprix@heinens_custom_prod, artuv@heinens_custom_prod WHERE avintar=aventar AND avidfin >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND avicinv=arvcinv AND arvcexr= ar_cproin)) NB_PROM_COMING, (SELECT LISTAGG(''['' || to_char(aveddeb, ''MM/DD/RR'') || '','' || to_char(avedfin, ''MM/DD/RR'') || '']'' , '' / '') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY aventar) FROM avetar@heinens_custom_prod WHERE avestat =2 AND avedfin >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM aveprix@heinens_custom_prod, artuv@heinens_custom_prod WHERE avintar=aventar AND avidfin >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND avicinv=arvcinv AND arvcexr= ar_cproin)) PROMOTION, INV_SKU, INV_PU, SSCC_ADDRESS FROM UBD, tb_art@HEINENS_STK_PROD, mv_merchstr WHERE ar_cproin=ul_cproin AND ar_ilogis=ul_ilogis AND ar_arprom=ul_arprom AND inv_sku > 0 AND scat_code = ar_niv4) SELECT WHS_CODE, DEPT_CODE, DEPT_DESC, SUB_DEPT_CODE, SUB_DEPT_DESC, CAT_CODE, CAT_DESC, SCAT_CODE, SCAT_DESC, CASE WHEN ((DAYS_LEFT-CONSUMER_DAYS) BETWEEN 31 AND 90) AND ((INV_SKU - (AVG_WK_SHIP/7)*(DAYS_LEFT-7)) > 0) THEN ''Caution'' WHEN ((DAYS_LEFT-CONSUMER_DAYS) BETWEEN 15 AND 30) AND ((INV_SKU - (AVG_WK_SHIP/7)*(DAYS_LEFT-7)) > 0) THEN ''Medium'' WHEN 7 > (DAYS_LEFT-CONSUMER_DAYS) AND ((INV_SKU - (AVG_WK_SHIP/7)*(DAYS_LEFT-7)) > 0) THEN ''High'' ELSE '''' END STATUS, VENDOR_CODE, VENDOR_DESC, ITEM_CODE, LV, ITEM_DESC, UBD, DAYS_LEFT, CONSUMER_DAYS, INV_SKU, INV_PU, AVG_WK_SHIP, NB_PROM_COMING, PROMOTION, SSCC_ADDRESS FROM UBD_LIST ORDER BY WHS_CODE ASC, ITEM_CODE, LV ASC, UBD ASC
